description: Cody Cummings is a high-profile football star who knows some fans would do just about anything to get close.  One such fan goes by the name Reed Royce and has worked his way into a waterboy position on Cody's team.  He's been eyeing Cody for some time now, waiting for the right opportunity to be alone with him.  Now his planning and maneuvering have put him right, smack in an empty locker room...well empty other than him and Cody!  Reed knows this is the time to make his move.  This is the moment when every decision counts.  Now is when he must pull out his A-game.  WILL he see past the nerves and move for the goal?  WILL he harness his inner strength to take his game where he's been hoping?  Can he deal with the pressure when superstar Cody shoves a massive, athletic cock into his mouth??  Does Reed have what it takes to service his idol on the field??  Will this encounter end in a burst of glorious triumph??  All bets are off, in this super hot locker room romp!!Enjoy!
title: Post Game Coverage
